json_schema.description: Refers to the JSON schema used to validate documents of this type

pixel_width.description: Gives more control of editor panel width. The panel is shown at min size if editor_size is small and max size if editor_size is medium. If min and max are the same no sizing button is displayed.

min.description: Minimum size in pixels for the right side editor flyout

max.description: Maximum size in pixels for the right side editor flyout

type.description: The group type to be displayed

depends_on_ref.description: Parameter name this group depends upon. Valid for panelSelector groups only.

insert_panels.description: Indicates whether panels, contained with a panelSelector, should be inserted between the radio buttons of a radio button set indicated by the depends_on_ref parameter.

nested_panel.description: Indicate whether panel should be nested. Nested panels are indented by 16px from the left and display left border. Default is false.

open.description: Used to determine if a panel is open or closed when UI is displayed.  Currenty only supported with twistyPanel. Default is false.

description.description: Group description. Used in a textPanel

parameter_refs.description: List of parameters to be displayed

action_refs.description: List of actions to be displayed.  Used with an actionPanel

data.description: Data passed to custom panel when group type is 'customPanel'

class_name.description: Optional class name to set for this group

parameter_ref.description: Parameter reference to base operator parameter definition

label_visible.description: Whether to display the label or not. If not displayed, the label can still be used by screen readers

description.description: Description of parameter with optional placement context

placement.description: Optional placement context for the text

control.description: Which control to use.  In most cases the control gets to be determined and should not be set

increment.description: Determines the increment/decrement value for the spinner control only

orientation.description: Determines how the control is displayed

width.description: Percentage of group width the control should use

char_limit.description: Limits the number of characters a user can enter into the control for string parameters only

display_chars.description: This has been deprecated and is subject to removal. Limits the number of characters displayed for a text field in a column in a table.  The text will have an ellipsis appended at this limit.

separator.description: Determines where to put a separator relative to the current control

visible.description: Determines whether to display parameter in control. Used in complex structures

place_holder_text.description: Text hint for the user displayed input controls

text_before.description: Static text to be displayed before the control

text_after.description: Static text to be displayed after the control

resource_key.description: Used as a key for enum value labels

edit_style.description: Editing style of elements in a table

value_icons.description: For enumerated types, this defines the set of icons for the valid values. The ordering must be consistent with the order in the parameter enum attribute.

sortable.description: Determines if this column values can be sorted into ascending/descending order in a table. Applies to structure parameters only.

filterable.description: Determines if this column values can be filtered so that only rows that match the filter in column values are shown in the table. Applies to structure parameters and multiselect control only.

language.description: The language for the expression editor syntax highlight and autocomplete workds. Applies to expression control type.

summary.description: Determines if this column values will be shown in the summaryPanel

generated_values.description: Generates values for a column in a 'readonly' parameter.

operation.description: Currently only 'index' is supported which will auto-increment the integer column value starting at 1. The start value can be configured by setting a start_value.

start_value.description: Optional start value to increment from when the 'type' is 'index'. If the start_value is not set, it will default to 1.

number_generator.description: Adds a number generation button beside the numeric control

label.description: Number generator button label. It is visible on hover.

dm_default.description: Used within complex structures containing 'column' key_definition fields. This associates the subControl parameter with a field attribute in the current record schema.

dm_icon.description: This can be set to display an icon of the corresponding dm type in the `role`:`column' field of a table.

custom_control_id.description: Used to determine which custom control to use when control=custom.

data.description: Data passed to custom control when control=custom

date_format.description: A format string such as YYYY-MM-DD which describes the display and entry format for a date field.

time_format.description: A format string such as HH:mm:ss which describes the display and entry format for a time field.

moveable_rows.description: Determines if rows can be moved up or down in a table or array of strings

rows.description: Number of rows to display in tables

action_ref.description: Determines an action should be added to the control

custom_value_allowed.description: Determines if a dropdown, outside of a table, can allow a custom value to be entered

class_name.description: Optional class name to set for this control

complex_type_ref.description: Name of complex type, can be referenced in other places.

layout.description: Array of rows containing structure element names

items.description: A single row of structure parameter names for laying out horizontally
A parameter name within the current structure

add_remove_rows.description: Determines if the table can have rows added and removed

row_selection.description: Determines how many rows can be selected at a time.  'multiple-edit': select multiple rows and allow the editing of column values for all selected rows.

header.description: Determines if the table header should be displayed

include_all_fields.description: Use when `add_remove_rows` is false. Ensures the control contains a record for each field in the data model.

description.description: Description of action.  Use for tooltip.

control.description: The action type to be displayed

image.description: Properties for how the image will look.  Use when control=image.

url.description: image url to be used for action

text_definition.description: Static text to be displayed before or after the control

type.description: Type of text message to display
